name: HarrisThoth - 12
author: Aurel L.
description:
Made
 for Lospec Discord September Study Palette Contest. The artist I 
studied was Frieda Harris, specifically the tarot she created in 
conbjuct with infamous Alisteir Crowley. I recently came into posession 
of the AGM URANIA copy of he deck which was made from the restored 
paintings she made. Even if this tarot was made by a jerk like Crowley, 
Harris art is worth it - it is enchanting, electric and overwhelming. I 
named my palette in her honour, as her name is often lost when 
discussing it even if she was the one who pushed Crowley to make it. Her
 paintings, more than his rants make this deck a piece of art for me.
